name: Saber Practice
description:
What is Saber Practice

Train your lightsaber skills with configurable module and follow your progression with result statistics.

Get better at sword handling and improve your reflexes, feel powerful and satisfied while deflecting shots et cutting stuff (comming soon)

Comming soon
  • Slicing module
  • Competitive mode with defined rules and ranking
Features
  • Precise deflection physic with a good feedback
  • Customizable lightsabers
  • Blaster shot deflection module with configurable difficulty
